judges: Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Steen and Patterson, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Stearns of the court below; costs to be paid by the appellants.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: James R. Wilson, with him Edwin G. O. Bleakly and William F. Zinger, for appellants.
casebody.head_matter:
Morgan’s Estate.
Argued December 2, 1940.
Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Steen and Patterson, JJ.
James R. Wilson, with him Edwin G. O. Bleakly and William F. Zinger, for appellants.
Herbert A. Barton, for appellee.
January 6, 1941:
